transcript: We've mistakenly lost our baggage. We're very sorry On behalf of Jeplieu I'd like to apologize for any inconvenience. I am allowed to issue you a $50 gift card which you can use any Future flights you want to take with us. I'm very sorry once again

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: we've mistakenly lost your baggage.  We're very sorry.  On behalf of Jet Blue I would like to apologize for any inconvenience.  I am allowed to issue you a fifty dollar gift card which you can use any future flights you want to take with us.  I'm very sorry, once again...
